name: niu tech
tagline: new technology, progressive web apps, html5 & css3, web development, iot...
body:
## about me

I am Jerzy Głowacki and I am a freelance web developer based in Kraków, Poland. Since 2006 I have been professionally building web sites and web apps. I am interested in new technology (hence the nickname), web browsers, html5, css3, progressive web apps, open source software and iot.

## projects

Here are just a few of my projects:

 - [Open source projects search](http://projects.niute.ch/) - including GitHub, GitLab, Sourceforge, Launchpad, etc.
 - [Web design search](http://webdesign.niute.ch/) - including Smashing Magazine, Tuts+, Speckyboy, DesignM.ag, etc.
 - [SwiftLang](https://swiftlang.eu/) - Apple Swift language resource center & community
 - [Node.php](https://github.com/niutech/node.php) - run node.js from PHP on a shared hosting
 - [HTMLPreview](http://htmlpreview.github.io/) - preview HTML files from GitHub or Bitbucket
 - [VoicePedia](http://niutech.github.io/voicepedia/) - a voice-enabled audio-visual encyclopedia, like Qwiki
 - [TopNewsFeed](http://niutech.github.io/topnewsfeed/) - a bookmarklet showing top News Feed posts on FB, Twitter, G+ and Instagram
 - [TypeScript Compile](https://github.com/niutech/typescript-compile) and [TypeScript Interpret](https://github.com/niutech/typescript-interpret) - run TypeScript on the fly in your browser
 - [JSBrowser Chrome Edition](https://github.com/niutech/JSBrowser-Chrome) - a web browser based on Microsoft JSBrowser
 - [Orion Desktop](https://github.com/niutech/orion-desktop) - desktop code editor based on Eclipse Orion
 - [Data Compression Proxy](https://github.com/niutech/datacompressionproxy) - now deprecated Google Chrome extension for compressing data
 - [Chrome DevTools Sidebar](https://github.com/niutech/chrome-devtools-sidebar) - shows bookmarks, history, any website as a real sidebar panel in Google Chrome
 - [PrIoT](http://documentup.com/niutech/priot/) - the Private Internet of Things manifesto

## links

 - [GitHub](http://github.com/niutech)
 - [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/912946/niutech)

## contact

E-mail: [contact form](http://goo.gl/forms/YSDyV4hyJ8SIsPMz2)
